body.name: Stamina Hyperextension Bench 2014 - Adjustable and Foldable Exercise Bench Roman Chair with Smart Workout App - Up to 250 lbs Weight Capacity
features: HOME FITNESS HYPEREXTENSION TRAINING- Our fitness bench helps strengthen the back while improving your posture, mobility, and balance. This exercise bench can relieve lower back stiffness and reduce the risk of any future injuries.

EFFICIENT CORE WORKOUT- This hyperextension bench is used for upper and lower body workouts for a convenient, all-in-one solution for sculpting your muscular core. This bench stabilizes your core muscles while toning your arms, glutes, and legs.
ADJUSTABLE AND COMFORTABLE - Our workout bench features height-adjustable, back and leg cushions, pivoting foam leg rollers, and wide, non-slip handlebars for a comfortable workout.

SPACE SAVING DESIGN - This compact and foldable sit up bench is designed for easy storage and is ideal for users with limited space. Our exercise bench provides complete high-quality upper and lower body workouts in the comfort of your home.

SMART WORKOUT APP - Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina Bench.
body.description: The Stamina Hyperextension Bench 2014 is suitable for strengthening the back while improving your posture, mobility, and balance. This exercise bench can relieve lower back stiffness and reduce the risk of any future injuries. This Bench provides a powerful solution for decompressing the spine. The combination of comfort and customization makes working out on the Bench a breeze for all users. This hyperextension bench is used for upper and lower body workouts for a convenient, all-in-one solution for sculpting your muscular core. This bench stabilizes your core muscles while toning your arms, glutes, and legs. Our workout bench can also be used as a stretching tool that relieves body stiffness. This ab bench features height-adjustable, back and leg cushion, pivoting foam leg rollers, and wide, non-slip handlebars for maximum comfort. This compact and foldable sit up bench is designed for easy storage and is ideal for users with limited space. Both the cushion and the footrests are height adjustable, making it easier to ensure you achieve proper alignment. Our exercise bench provides complete high-quality training movements in the comfort of your home. CONVENIENT SMART WORKOUT APP- This home gym equipment is fully supported by muuv, the all-in-one app that provides smart guided audio coaching, follow-along assembly videos, and personalized workouts, and helps you move 500+ minutes per month with the right mix of cardio, strength, and flexibility for a healthy and sustainable lifestyle. The all-in-one app comes with a follow-along assembly video, personalized workouts tailored to your strength training equipment, and an ad-free music listening experience from iHeartRadio. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store. Providing you with the best workout and fitness experience, get visible results, and track your progress with Stamina.

This exercise bench can relieve lower back stiffness and reduce the risk of any future injuries. It also provides a powerful solution for decompressing the spine, stabilizing your core muscles, and toning your arms, glutes, and legs. Exercise Bench for Upper and Lower Body Workouts If you desire an all-in-one way to target the lower back, hips, glutes, erector spinae and core for strengthening, toning and relief, look no further than the Stamina Hyperextension Bench 2014. This exercise bench is used for upper and lower body workouts for a convenient, all-in-one solution for sculpting your muscular core. It provides complete high-quality training movements in the comfort of your home. The Stamina Hyperextension Bench 2014 supports weight of up to 250lbs, and height between 4 feet 9 inches to 6 feet 6 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and stable
reviews.reviewText: I was going to get one of the cheaper $72 models, 6 months earlier. But they had a stock out, during peak of pandemic. When I went back to order one, I noticed this one was $20 more, but looked more substantial. And reviews were better. So I ordered it. Arrived fairly soon. Assembly was a bit detailed, even for a former bench mechanic like me. But the instructions were fairly clear, and very specific, in sequence, with good illustrations. Not only is it very stable and sturdy, it also has some space between the two hip/thigh pads. That is a big plus, for an adult male. The cushions are thick and firm but flexible. The parts all fit together with excellent tolerances. On other assembly-required equipment in past, I often encounter inscrutible instructions or impossible diagrams, or missing parts. But this one was perfect. Five stars. And it helps my back a lot. I don't have back problems but this will help prevent them from developing. Most guys my age do have or develop back problems. I'm 5'7" and 150 lbs. This equipment is a fine fit for me. Estimate it would work for a person down to about 5'0" and up to about 6' 0". Might work beyond that, but I wouldn't know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: It arrived today and it took about 1/2 to unbox and assemble. All the parts were there, and it included two wrenches needed to tighten the bolts and nuts. The assembly instructions were reasonably good and how it goes together is rather intuitive. I wanted this bench because my lower back needs work and I already have a "regular" weight bench for my other needs. This makes a good one-trick-pony that is not too expensive. It is light, reasonably compact, and easy to move. I am 5'9" with a 32" inseam and the bench needs the lowest/shortest setting. If you have short legs this bench may prove a challenge. (The 2 locking knobs my still prove adequate even though the main one does not slide into a provided hole... but I did not need to try that. Or you could add another hole with a drill and metal bit.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I wanted for my home gym. High quality, very sturdy and easy assembly. I highly suggest it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great.
reviews.reviewText: I am 6' 4" and weigh about 215 and it works for me. I would say anyone that is 250 and above would break it. I recommend this roman chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stable Bench - Good purchase
reviews.reviewText: This bench is pretty stable. I am 5'11" and 187 lbs. I purchased it for the sole purpose of strengthening my lower back to see if I can remediate some minor discomfort I have been having as I got older. The bench came in a well padded medium sized box. Instructions were pretty clear and comes with 2 wrenches and all the bolts to assemble it properly. Fairly easy to put together and once adjusted to fit your body size, it provides solid support for back exercises. I am sure this can accommodate a person that is over 6' feet tall without any issues. I have not tried any other hyperextension bench, but if you only want to strengthen your lower back muscles, this is a good bench. I keep my bench in the garage and plan to use it regularly so I cannot speak as to how easy it is to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It wobblers a bit but I have been using this a lot for over a month and I feel it is secure. I like that it can be collapsed but don’t expect to slid it under a bed. I just rest it against a wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Addition for Home workouts
reviews.reviewText: Just arrived yesterday. I easily assembled it today using the great step by step instructions. See attached photo. It came with the wrenches needed, and an owners manual. It's my first day with it so I can't speak to it's durability, BUT it looks to be sturdy. I'm 64, and plan on using this to strengthen my back, glutes and ab muscles. Along with my step glider, weights, yoga matt and out door activities I hope to get back in shape this summer. Pandemic weight must come off ! Maybe your last year was like mine. Stress eating, and not enough exercise. I'm excited to add this equipment to my in-home workouts. Worth the purchase !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for price
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'11" 200 pounds. I would not use this if you're taller or much heavier. It does the job for me, but there should just be a release pin instead of 2 screw knobs. The inner tube that slids in the shaft still wobbles when knob is screwed tight and the end is starting to push through the shat from all my weight against it. Should have used thicker metal. Still, not terrible for the price

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Foldable Roman Chair at a Reasonable Price
reviews.reviewText: Great Foldable Stamina Hyperextension Bench!- well designed- comfortable to use- excellent welds- excellent paint job- easy to assembleI'm a happy customer - 5'6" - 155 Lbs.Thank you for a great product at a reasonable price!
I didn't want to spend a lot of money or have something that takes too much space.It does the job.

reviews.reviewTitle: The instructions are actually clear and easy to follow - astonishing
reviews.reviewText: It's been years since I bought something with instructions this clear and easy to followCompany deserves a reward for just that.

I notice the price has gone up since I purchased this item. That being said, it was easy to assemble and works well enough. While it seems to be sturdy enough, I still recommend using a couple of C-clamps to lock the back legs to the floor to prevent any potential lifting if you are top-heavy.

reviews.reviewTitle: It does what it does, but it’s not that adjustable.
reviews.reviewText: Needs more holes for locking in different lengths.
